name: Крем Невская косметика Пантенол универсальный 40мл
ingredients: aqua, panthenol , hydrogenated polyisobutene, butyrospermum parkii oil, glyceryl stearate , cetearyl alcohol, glyceryl stearate citrate , stearyl heptanoate, stearyl caprylate , carbomer, triethanolamine, bht, phenoxyethanol, ethylhexylglycerin
